alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 05 at 1:10AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible Saturday afternoon. * WHERE...A portion of north central Wyoming, including the following areas, Bighorn Mountains Southeast and Bighorn Mountains West. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Localized flooding is possible from heavy rainfall rates or continuous or training storms. Rainfall rates 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible.
info.instruction: Continue to monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
